full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN RNAL 'BYOR N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BCU GCIG GIS NYAMS LEN SNYING POR DRIL BA SNYAN RGYUD GSER GYI YANG ZHUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,SNOD MIN LA GSANG BA'I CHOS SA MA YA,
